name: Owen Mark
description: HI,.I’m Owen as you know from my profile on the site. I live in London, United Kingdom. I’m about 5’9 feet, brown eyes, weight 80 kg, I was born in France, but was raised and educated in England. My father is France born, but my mother is from England. I am currently working as a Senior Offshore Engineer in Shell DPT petroleum and petrochemical and I work on a Contract basis. i’m a free lancer here in England, most of my time i spent at sea doing offshore. I was born into a family of two, am the second with my sister who is married, her name is Flora. I’m an easy going person, has a great sense of humor, I like to make new friends, I’m an open-minded person, romantic at heart. My favorite color is blue I like horror movies, football, bowling, dancing, swimming and amusement parks anything fun.
